name: ASI-Core Development Roadmap
description: Projektmanagement für ASI-Core - Artificial Self-Intelligence System
body:
# ASI-Core Development Roadmap

## 🎯 Vision
Professionelles, lebenslanges, dezentrales digitales Gedächtnis mit KI-gestützter Reflexionsanalyse.

## 📊 Projekt Status
- **Phase:** Beta Testing (30 Tage)
- **Start:** 11.09.2024
- **Ende:** 11.10.2024

## 🏗️ Architektur
- **Frontend:** React PWA (Vite)
- **Backend:** Python FastAPI
- **Storage:** SQLite + IPFS + Arweave
- **Blockchain:** Polygon/Mumbai
- **AI:** Sentence Transformers

## 🎯 Meilensteine

### ✅ MVP (Abgeschlossen)
- [x] Lokale Reflexions-Erfassung
- [x] SQLite Datenbank
- [x] Grundlegende PWA
- [x] GitHub Actions CI/CD

### 🔄 Beta Phase (Aktuell)
- [ ] PWA GitHub Pages Deployment
- [ ] Blockchain Integration
- [ ] IPFS Storage
- [ ] Security Hardening
- [ ] User Testing Feedback

### 🚀 Enterprise Release (Q1 2025)
- [ ] Multi-Device Sync
- [ ] Advanced AI Features
- [ ] Mobile Apps
- [ ] API für Drittanbieter
- [ ] Enterprise Security

## 📈 KPIs
- **User Adoption:** 100+ Beta Tester
- **Uptime:** 99.9%
- **Security:** Zero Critical Vulnerabilities
- **Performance:** <100ms Response Time

## 👥 Team
- **Lead Developer:** @swisscomfort
- **Beta Testers:** Community Contributors
- **Security:** Automated Scanning

## 🔗 Links
- [Repository](https://github.com/swisscomfort/asi-core)
- [Live PWA](https://swisscomfort.github.io/asi-core/)
- [Documentation](./docs/)
- [Security](./docs/security.md)

---
